definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Therefore, the WKB method is useful in the non- even wave guide.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可以把WKB方法直接用到非均匀波导中。

sentences.english: Finally, some basic optical waveguide theory problems, which are waiting for consideration in optical waveguide technique developement, are proposal.
sentences.chinese: 提出了光波导技术发展中有待于考虑的若干基本问题。

sentences.english: These little splashes of matter had been trapped in very shallow corrugations in the magnetic guide.
sentences.chinese: 这些小的物质液滴被磁波导里非常浅的起伏给困住了。

sentences.english: In this thesis, the digital waveguide networks (DWN) method is applied in the research of vector sound field.
sentences.chinese: 本文将数字波导网络法应用到矢量声场的研究中。

sentences.english: The beam splitter based on photonic crystal waveguides is taken as an essential component in integrated optical circuits.
sentences.chinese: 光子晶体波导分束器是集成光学电路的重要组成元件。

sentences.english: A simple way is used to approximate the curvilinear metal boundary of circular groove guide.
sentences.chinese: 用一种简单方法来近似圆形槽波导的曲线金属边界。

sentences.english: II. A novel waveguide structure was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新的波导结构。

sentences.english: This paper designs a novel drive system of the waveguide multilayer memory( WMM).
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新型的波导多层存储光盘驱动系统。

sentences.english: In addition, we predict the condition for single mode transverse operation in a waveguide FEL.
sentences.chinese: 最后指出了波导自由电子激光器单横模运行的条件。

sentences.english: The glass thin film for optical waveguides is deposited by the magnetron sputtering ?
sentences.chinese: 采用磁控射频溅射法制备光波导用玻璃薄膜。

sentences.english: A new method for measuring waveguide wavelength using microwave paramagnetic resonance instrument was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了一种利用微波顺磁共振仪测量波导波长的方法。

sentences.english: The four-layer leaky waveguide mechanism is analyzed by perturbation method also.
sentences.chinese: 并用微扰法计算和分析了四层漏波导结构。

sentences.english: In this paper, the design of a planar waveguide monopulse comparator is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种平面型波导单脉冲比较器的设计。

sentences.english: The design method of self-biased circulator with coplanar waveguide structure was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 最后，研究了共面波导自偏置环行器的设计方法。

sentences.english: The rectangular groove guide (RGG) is analyzed by the finite element method (FEM).
sentences.chinese: 本文用有限元法分析了矩形槽波导。

sentences.english: Anovel feeding structure for inset dielectric guide is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种插入介质波导的新型馈电布局。
